\chapter{Univa\sphinxhyphen{}Gateway API Documentation}
\label{\detokenize{about:univa-gateway-api-documentation}}\label{\detokenize{about::doc}}

\section{Overview}
\label{\detokenize{about:overview}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
This is the complete API interface documentation for the \sphinxstylestrong{Univa\sphinxhyphen{}Gateway} web application. These REST endpoints provide programmatic access to manage IoT gateways, devices, and telemetry data.


\section{API Structure}
\label{\detokenize{about:api-structure}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
All endpoints follow RESTful conventions and are organized into logical categories:

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Authentication API
\sphinxhyphen{} User login, token management, and session handling
\sphinxhyphen{} Separate authentication system with JWT tokens

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Device Management API
\sphinxhyphen{} Gateway and device provisioning
\sphinxhyphen{} Configuration management
\sphinxhyphen{} Real\sphinxhyphen{}time monitoring

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Data Collection API
\sphinxhyphen{} Telemetry data ingestion
\sphinxhyphen{} Historical data queries
\sphinxhyphen{} Real\sphinxhyphen{}time data streams

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Configuration API
\sphinxhyphen{} System settings
\sphinxhyphen{} Gateway parameters
\sphinxhyphen{} Network configuration


\section{Base URL}
\label{\detokenize{about:base-url}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
All API calls should be made to:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{https}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{api}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{univa}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{gateway}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{com}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{api}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{v1}\PYG{o}{/}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{Usage}
\label{\detokenize{about:usage}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
To use the Univa\sphinxhyphen{}Gateway API:
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Authenticate} using the Authentication API

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Include token} in subsequent requests

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Call endpoints} as documented in the full API reference

\end{enumerate}

\sphinxAtStartPar
For complete endpoint details, parameters, and examples, refer to the interactive API documentation at:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{https}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{docs}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{univa}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{gateway}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{com}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{n}{api}\PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{n}{reference}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\chapter{Device Management API}
\label{\detokenize{api/device-management:device-management-api}}\label{\detokenize{api/device-management::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
APIs for managing devices, groups, and device operations.


\section{Overview}
\label{\detokenize{api/device-management:overview}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
This API handles all device management operations including device CRUD, scanning, grouping, and device diagnostics.


\section{Endpoints}
\label{\detokenize{api/device-management:endpoints}}

\section{Notes}
\label{\detokenize{api/device-management:notes}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Device Status}: Online, Offline, Disabled, Error

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Device Types}: Modbus RTU, Modbus TCP, Wireless RF, Ethernet

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Scan Types}: modbus\sphinxhyphen{}rtu, modbus\sphinxhyphen{}tcp, wireless, auto

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{File Upload}: CSV import supports .csv files with specific columns

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Real\sphinxhyphen{}time Updates}: Consider WebSocket for real\sphinxhyphen{}time device status updates

\end{itemize}


\section{Troubleshooting}
\label{\detokenize{api/device-management:troubleshooting}}\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Device Not Responding}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Check physical connection
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify device address
\sphinxhyphen{} Test with ping function

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Scan Not Finding Devices}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify network configuration
\sphinxhyphen{} Check firewall settings
\sphinxhyphen{} Ensure correct scan type

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Import/Export Issues}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify CSV format
\sphinxhyphen{} Check file encoding (UTF\sphinxhyphen{}8 recommended)
\sphinxhyphen{} Ensure required columns are present

\end{enumerate}

\sphinxstepscope


\chapter{Tag Mapping API}
\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping:tag-mapping-api}}\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
APIs for managing tag mappings between devices and data points.


\section{Overview}
\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping:overview}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The Tag Mapping API allows you to create, read, update, and delete mappings between physical device addresses and logical tag names. This enables data normalization and abstraction across different protocols and devices.


\section{Endpoints}
\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping:endpoints}}

\section{Examples}

\subsection{Python \sphinxhyphen{} Create Tag Mapping}
\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping:python-create-tag-mapping}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k+kn}{import}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nn}{requests}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Get devices for dropdown}
\PYG{n}{headers} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Authorization}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Bearer your\PYGZus{}token}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\PYG{n}{devices\PYGZus{}response} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{requests}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{get}\PYG{p}{(}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{https://api.example.com/v1/tag\PYGZhy{}mapping/devices}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{n}{headers}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{headers}
\PYG{p}{)}

\PYG{n}{devices} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{devices\PYGZus{}response}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{json}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{devices}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{]}
\PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+sa}{f}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Available devices: }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n+nb}{len}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{devices}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Get protocol form for Modbus RTU}
\PYG{n}{protocol\PYGZus{}response} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{requests}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{get}\PYG{p}{(}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{https://api.example.com/v1/tag\PYGZhy{}mapping/protocol\PYGZhy{}forms/modbus\PYGZhy{}rtu}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{n}{headers}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{n}{headers}
\PYG{p}{)}

\PYG{n}{protocol\PYGZus{}config} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{protocol\PYGZus{}response}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{json}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+sa}{f}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Protocol: }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n}{protocol\PYGZus{}config}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{protocol}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+sa}{f}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Supported data types: }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n}{protocol\PYGZus{}config}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{supportedDataTypes}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Create new tag mapping}

\section{Notes}
\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping:notes}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Validation Rules
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Tag Name}
\sphinxhyphen{} Must be unique across all devices
\sphinxhyphen{} Only alphanumeric and underscore allowed
\sphinxhyphen{} Maximum 50 characters

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Address Validation}
\sphinxhyphen{} Protocol\sphinxhyphen{}specific validation
\sphinxhyphen{} Modbus: 0\sphinxhyphen{}65535 for addresses
\sphinxhyphen{} CANBus: Hex format (0x000\sphinxhyphen{}0x7FF or 0x00000000\sphinxhyphen{}0x1FFFFFFF)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Poll Interval}
\sphinxhyphen{} Minimum: 50ms
\sphinxhyphen{} Maximum: 60000ms (1 minute)
\sphinxhyphen{} Default: 1000ms

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Scale/Offset}
\sphinxhyphen{} Scale cannot be 0
\sphinxhyphen{} Offset can be negative

\end{enumerate}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Performance Considerations
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Maximum tags per device}: 1000

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Total tags per gateway}: 10,000

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Polling overhead}: Consider total polling frequency

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Memory usage}: Each tag consumes \textasciitilde{}1KB of memory

\end{itemize}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Best Practices
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Naming Convention}
\sphinxhyphen{} Use descriptive tag names
\sphinxhyphen{} Include units in tag names (e.g., â€œTemperature\_Câ€)
\sphinxhyphen{} Group related tags with similar prefixes

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Category Organization}
\sphinxhyphen{} Use consistent categories
\sphinxhyphen{} Limit to 10\sphinxhyphen{}15 categories maximum
\sphinxhyphen{} Use subcategories if needed

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Validation Ranges}
\sphinxhyphen{} Set realistic min/max values
\sphinxhyphen{} Include safety margins
\sphinxhyphen{} Update ranges based on operational data

\end{enumerate}


\section{Troubleshooting}
\label{\detokenize{api/tag-mapping:troubleshooting}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Common Issues
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{â€œTag name already existsâ€}
\sphinxhyphen{} Check for duplicate names
\sphinxhyphen{} Use search to find existing tags

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{â€œInvalid addressâ€}
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify protocol\sphinxhyphen{}specific address format
\sphinxhyphen{} Check device address space limitations

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{â€œDevice not respondingâ€}
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify device is online
\sphinxhyphen{} Check network connectivity
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify protocol configuration

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{CSV Import Errors}
\sphinxhyphen{} Check CSV format and encoding
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify required columns are present
\sphinxhyphen{} Check data type compatibility

\end{enumerate}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Debug Tips
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Enable debug logging for tag operations

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Test with single tag before bulk import

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Verify device communication before mapping

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use the â€œTest Connectionâ€ feature if available

\end{enumerate}

\chapter{Cloud Integration API}
\label{\detokenize{api/cloud-integration:cloud-integration-api}}\label{\detokenize{api/cloud-integration::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
APIs for configuring and managing cloud service connections.


\section{Overview}
\label{\detokenize{api/cloud-integration:overview}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The Cloud Integration API allows you to connect your IoT gateway to various cloud services and platforms for data publishing, remote monitoring, and analytics. Supports MQTT, HTTP, and other protocols.


\section{Endpoints}
\label{\detokenize{api/cloud-integration:endpoints}}

\section{Examples}

\subsection{Python \sphinxhyphen{} Create MQTT Connection}
\label{\detokenize{api/cloud-integration:python-create-mqtt-connection}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k+kn}{import}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nn}{requests}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Create MQTT connection}
\PYG{n}{headers} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Authorization}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Bearer your\PYGZus{}token}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}

\PYG{n}{mqtt\PYGZus{}config} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{type}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{mqtt}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{name}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Production MQTT Broker}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{enabled}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{k+kc}{True}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{connection}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{host}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{mqtt.example.com}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{port}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+m+mi}{1883}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{protocol}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{mqtt}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{username}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{gateway}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{password}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{password123}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{clientId}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{gateway\PYGZus{}001}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{cleanSession}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{k+kc}{True}
    \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{topics}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{baseTopic}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{factory/area1/gateway001}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{dataTopic}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdl{}}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZob{}baseTopic\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{/data}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{eventTopic}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdl{}}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZob{}baseTopic\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{/events}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}

\section{Security Considerations}
\label{\detokenize{api/cloud-integration:security-considerations}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Credential Management
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Password Storage}
\sphinxhyphen{} Encrypted at rest
\sphinxhyphen{} Never logged in plaintext
\sphinxhyphen{} Rotate regularly

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Certificate Handling}
\sphinxhyphen{} Secure certificate upload
\sphinxhyphen{} Private key protection
\sphinxhyphen{} Certificate expiration monitoring

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Network Security}
\sphinxhyphen{} Use TLS/SSL where available
\sphinxhyphen{} Validate certificates
\sphinxhyphen{} Use VPN for sensitive connections

\end{enumerate}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\#\#\# Data Privacy
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar

\PYG{l+s+sb}{        \PYGZlt{}button onclick=\PYGZdq{}upgradeTrial(\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZdl{}\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n+nx}{data}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{trial\PYGZus{}id}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+sb}{\PYGZsq{})\PYGZdq{}\PYGZgt{}Upgrade Now\PYGZlt{}/button\PYGZgt{}}
\PYG{l+s+sb}{    }\PYG{l+s+sb}{`}\PYG{p}{;}

\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{n+nb}{document}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{body}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{appendChild}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{warningDiv}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}

\PYG{c+c1}{// Connect WebSocket when page loads}
\PYG{n+nb}{document}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{addEventListener}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}DOMContentLoaded\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{connectLicenseWebSocket}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}

\section{Notes}
\label{\detokenize{api/license:notes}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{License Tiers}: Standard, Pro, Enterprise, Custom

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Activation Types}: Online, Offline, Network

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Feature Categories}: Safety, Analytics, Control, Reporting, Integration

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Sync Frequencies}: Manual, Hourly, Daily, Weekly, On Startup

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Trial Durations}: 7 days, 14 days, 30 days (configurable)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Export Formats}: JSON, Encrypted (.lic), CSV

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{WebSocket Events}: Real\sphinxhyphen{}time updates for license changes, trial warnings, expiry notifications

\end{itemize}


\section{Troubleshooting}
\label{\detokenize{api/license:troubleshooting}}\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{License Activation Failed}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify internet connection for online activation
\sphinxhyphen{} Check license key format (XXXX\sphinxhyphen{}XXXX\sphinxhyphen{}XXXX\sphinxhyphen{}XXXX)
\sphinxhyphen{} Ensure gateway hardware signature is correct

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Cloud Sync Issues}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Check cloud account linking status
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify API connectivity to license server
\sphinxhyphen{} Review sync logs for specific errors

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Feature Not Available}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Check current license tier supports the feature
\sphinxhyphen{} Verify feature is not already in trial period
\sphinxhyphen{} Ensure subscription is active and paid

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Trial Management}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Trials are per\sphinxhyphen{}feature, not per\sphinxhyphen{}license
\sphinxhyphen{} Trial extensions may require approval
\sphinxhyphen{} Upgrading trial preserves trial data

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Backup/Restore}:
\sphinxhyphen{} Backups expire after 7 days for security
\sphinxhyphen{} Encrypted backups require password for restore
\sphinxhyphen{} Restore may require gateway reboot for full effect

\end{enumerate}


\section{Security Considerations}
\label{\detokenize{api/license:security-considerations}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
All license keys are masked in logs and UI

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Hardware binding prevents license cloning

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Activation limits prevent license abuse

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Encrypted backups protect sensitive data

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
WebSocket connections require authentication tokens

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Rate limiting applied to activation endpoints

\end{itemize}

\end{itemize}
